text: Mauro Da Dalto (born 8 April 1981) is an Italian professional road bicycle racer, who last rode for UCI ProTeam . Born in Conegliano, Da Dalto started in the Marchiol-Ima-Famila team, the semi-professional branch of the Liquigas- team for neo-professionals. At the end of 2005, Da Dalto signed a contract at .Liquigas-Bianchi taking shape for 2006 He has also ridden for . ==Career achievements== ===Major results=== Da Dalto has won one stage in his career, before he started as a full professional. ;2004 :1st Stage 4 Giro delle Valli Cuneesi nelle Alpi del Mare ;2005 :1st Coppa Caduti di Reda ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2007 ! scope="col" | 2008 ! scope="col" | 2009 ! scope="col" | 2010 ! scope="col" | 2011 ! scope="col" | 2012 ! scope="col" | 2013 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |— | style="text- align:center;"|120 |— |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |— | style="text-align:center;"|123 |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España | style="text-align:center;"|101 |— |— |— | style="text- align:center;"|147 | style="text-align:center;"|130 |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==Notes and references== == External links == *Profile at Liquigas official website Category:Italian male cyclists Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People from the Province of Treviso Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Veneto
